entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING , Charlevoix
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:34 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Current Conditions: -10.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Charlevoix 10:00 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

Humidity: 91 %

Wind: km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday: Snow at times heavy. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy and local blowing snow. Amount 20 to 30 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 16 this morning and minus 8 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy. Temperature rising to plus 1 this evening then falling.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Amount 30 to 40 cm. Wind northeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming southwest 40 gusting to 60 near midnight. Temperature rising to plus 1 this evening then falling. Wind chill minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022

entry.title: Saturday: A few flurries. High minus 7.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending in the afternoon then cloudy. Local blowing snow in the morning. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 7. Wind chill near minus 18. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Friday 23 December 2022
